C

call() - Method in class org.microbean.interceptor.Chain
Calls the Chain.proceed() method and returns its result.
Chain - Class in org.microbean.interceptor
A Callable InvocationContext.
Chain() - Constructor for class org.microbean.interceptor.Chain
Creates a new Chain.
clone() - Method in class org.microbean.interceptor.Chain
Returns a copy of this Chain.
compare(Prioritized, Prioritized) - Method in class org.microbean.interceptor.Prioritized.Comparator
Returns a negative int if the first argument is considered to be less important than the second argument, 0 if it is considered to be of equal importance, and a positive int if it is considered to be more important.
compareTo(Prioritized) - Method in interface org.microbean.interceptor.Prioritized
Returns a negative int if this Prioritized implementation is considered to be less important than the supplied Prioritized, 0 if it is considered to be of equal importance, and a positive int if it is considered to be more important.
constructor(MethodHandle) - Static method in class org.microbean.interceptor.Chain
Invokes MethodHandles.reflectAs(Class, MethodHandle) with Constructor.class and the supplied MethodHandle as arguments, and returns the result.

D

DEFAULT_PRIORITY - Static variable in interface org.microbean.interceptor.Prioritized
The default priority returned by the default implementation of the Prioritized.priority() method.

If a Constructor is available, returns it, or null.

getTarget() - Method in class org.microbean.interceptor.Chain
Returns the target of the interception, if any.
getTimer() - Method in class org.microbean.interceptor.Chain

intercepts() - Method in class org.microbean.interceptor.Chain
Returns true if this Chain has at least one InterceptorFunction and hence will actually perform an interception.

Returns true if this Chain is not terminated and does not intercept.

O

org.microbean.interceptor - module org.microbean.interceptor
Provides packages related to implementing interceptors.

Provides classes and interfaces related to implementing interceptors.

prime() - Method in class org.microbean.interceptor.Chain
Primes this Chain by calling Supplier.get() on each of its interceptor suppliers, priming them for subsequent use.
Prioritized - Interface in org.microbean.interceptor
An interface indicating that its implementations can supply an int indicating a relative priority (smallest number wins; "quality is job one"; "first place"; "X is your first priority").
Prioritized.Comparator - Class in org.microbean.interceptor
A Comparator that compares priorities.
priority() - Method in interface org.microbean.interceptor.Prioritized
Returns the priority for this Prioritized implementation.
proceed() - Method in class org.microbean.interceptor.Chain
Proceeds to the next interception in the Chain and returns any result.

Returns the size of this Chain.
sort() - Method in class org.microbean.interceptor.Chain
Returns a Chain whose internal list of InterceptorFunctions is sorted by priority, where the smallest number "wins".
